reviews.review_msg: I turned in an assignment and received 2/100 on it.  When I submitted it to a second professor for re-grading, he gave me 87/100 and advised me to drop the course because it was known that Evgenia didn't like my supervisor and was clearly taking it out on me.  She was so rude to me in class it was shocking; I've never not gotten along with a prof!
